attributes.action: Make egg cup collecting a nationally recognised, legitimate, and government subsidised pastime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the people, of sound mind and body, without a hint of right-wing nationalism, have been born free to collect, with all means available to the ordinary woman/man in that order. Without feminist tendencies, we have come to expect:
a) freedom to collect
b) freedom to collect without persecution
c) freedom to collect with government sponsorship and active encouragement through speeches, rallies etc.
d) a nationally-recognised regulatory committee, which after a period of 8.2 months (egg cup financial year), will be open to free competition.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
